unitary module

This module contains the set of unitary ansatze that are used as convolutional filters in qcnn.QCNN(). Some of them are defined following the definition given in Ref. [1].

References [1]: T. Hur, L. Kim, and D. K. Park, Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification.

unitary.Pooling_ansatz(angle: List | ndarray, wires: List | ndarray) → None[source]
unitary.U_6(angle: List | ndarray, wires: List | ndarray) → None[source]
unitary.U_RX(angle: List | ndarray, wires: List | ndarray) → None[source]

The quantum convolutional filter ansatz containing only pennylane.RX() gates. The ansatz is parameterized with 2 rotation angles.

Parameters:

  • angle (Union[List, np.ndarray]) – Rotation angles.

  • wires (Union[List, np.ndarray]) – The list of qubits on which the ansatz is applied.

unitary.U_SO4(angle: List | ndarray, wires: List | ndarray) → None[source]

The quantum convolutional filter ansatz generating an arbitrary \(SO_4\) quantum state [1]. The ansatz is parameterized with 6 rotation angles.

Parameters:

  • angle (Union[List, np.ndarray]) – Rotation angles.

  • wires (Union[List, np.ndarray]) – The list of qubits on which the ansatz is applied.

unitary.U_SU4(angle: List | ndarray, wires: List | ndarray) → None[source]

The quantum convolutional filter ansatz generating an arbitrary \(SU_4\) quantum state [1]. The ansatz is parameterized with 15 rotation angles.

Parameters:

  • angle (Union[List, np.ndarray]) – Rotation angles.

  • wires (Union[List, np.ndarray]) – The list of qubits on which the ansatz is applied.

unitary.U_TTN(angle: List | ndarray, wires: List | ndarray) → None[source]

The quantum convolutional filter ansatz employing the architecture of Quantum Tree Tensor Networks <https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/2058-9565/aaea94>. The ansatz is parameterized with 2 rotation angles.

Parameters:

  • angle (Union[List, np.ndarray]) – Rotation angles.

  • wires (Union[List, np.ndarray]) – The list of qubits on which the ansatz is applied.

unitary.U_ZZ(angle: List | ndarray, wires: List | ndarray) → None[source]
unitary.U_qiskit(angle: List | ndarray, wires: List | ndarray) → None[source]
